make_node_set helper function

Summary

make_node_set creates a set of nodes.

Note

The feature requires C++11.

Syntax

template <typename Node, typename... Nodes>
implementation-defined-type make_node_set(Node& n0, Nodes&... nodes);

Header

#define TBB_PREVIEW_FLOW_GRAPH_FEATURES 1
#include "tbb/flow_graph.h"

Description

Template function make_node_set creates a set of nodes that can be passed as an argument to the functions make_edges, follows and precedes.

Example

Examples from make_edges helper function and Helper Functions for Expressing Graphs pages illustrate how make_node_set can be used.
